scripts.activate: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const isWindows = process.platform === 'win32' || process.env.OS === 'Windows_NT'; const cmd = isWindows ? 'venv\\Scripts\\activate.bat' : 'source venv/bin/activate'; execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.run: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const isWindows = process.platform === 'win32' || process.env.OS === 'Windows_NT'; const cmd = isWindows ? 'venv\\Scripts\\python.exe src/jobly_scraper.py' : 'venv/bin/python3 src/jobly_scraper.py'; execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
